mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seenema.movie_tbl (movieTitle, genre, plot, director, actors, viewAge, releaseDate, theater, runningTime, postFileName, previewURL, hit, playingTime, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{movieTitle}, #{genre}, #{plot}, #{director}, #{actors}, #{viewAge}, #{releaseDate}, #{theater}, #{runningTime}, #{postFileName}, #{previewURL}, #{hit}, #{playingTime}, #{start_date}, #{end_date})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM seenema.movie_tbl order by movieCode DESC LIMIT 8;
